title: LP Refunds
body:
Your shit client causes players to fail to load into a game. You also fail to do anything about AFK players. You could easily refund LP for these things your shit client causes but you fail to. Shows you dont give a fuck about your fans. Shame. 

Your client failed to let me load into a game in game 1 of promos and then i got the pleasure of having someone rage quit 4 minutes into another game. I didnt even get a chance to play promos. Now at 62 LP. It will take me 5 more games to win placements when i didnt even get to play them. I am not the only player this happens to.

replies.body: I know Riot should fix this, but you can get around it in the interim by killing the client in the task manager then reloading it.
